short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to calculate the cost of time spent in a meeting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome extension enables users to view the meeting cost based upon the number of attendees accepting the invites and the duration of the meeting. The script parses the duration and meeting attendee numbers from the DOM after the html has been loaded in the chrome browser and calculates and displays the cost which is set by the administator.
